my:Hazard.my:Description: Slips, trips, fall, trapped fingers or toes
my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: Proper PPE should be worn, personnel should be properly clothed and equipped.
a) Use of suitable and appropriate PPE: ear defenders; b) An alternative means of communication may need to be established.

my:Hazard.my:Description: Environment atmosphere - CO2 leaks during operation and maintenance/inspection
my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) The pressure gauge on the manifold has to be checked. The reading should be "0"; if not, do not touch, leave the CO2 Room, and inform the Company. If the reading is "0" then open the valve to empty, open the hold, no persons inside. b) Before maintenance of CO2 installation, secure (pin "in") the CO2 bottles of Engine Room section

my:Main.my:Footer: Risk Assessment: G 17 - Entry/Maintenance in CO2 Room
